li.label: terrible flower dance
li.description: Those nuns hobbled around like they've had a bit too much to drink beforehand, and they trampled all over the offerings. Our ancestors would weep at such a disgrace!

li.label: mediocre flower dance
li.description: The nuns' movements were stiff, unnatural and passionless. There was hardly any dignity to the ceremony.

li.label: beautiful flower dance
li.description: The flower dance was beautiful. The nuns really moved with grace and finesse. Our ancestors would be pleased with our devotion to their memory.

li.label: unforgettable flower dance
li.description: The flower dance was specatular! The nuns danced with otherworldly grace, their movements flowing like a gentle breeze, flower petals raining everywhere. It was as if the spirits of our very ancestors were here with us!

li.label: few flowers destroyed
li.description: A handful of flowers were snuffed out before they could fully blossom...what a shame!

li.label: some flowers destroyed
li.description: Our flower beds are blemished with missing blooms, every broken stem a reminder of how fragile the beauty of nature can be.

li.label: many flowers destroyed
li.description: Our gardens are scarred with swaths of ravaged stems, where dozens of colored petals once danced gaily in the breeze, a place of tranquility now a stark testament to all that has been lost.

li.label: countless flowers destroyed
li.description: Our gardens are ruined! Valerian forgive us, for we have failed our stewardship of this land!

li.label: no flowers planted
li.description: Our beds lay bare and the the soil unturned. There are no new blooms this year...

li.label: few flowers planted
li.description: Our gardens look so sparse... We've barely planted any new flowers this year.

li.label: some flowers planted
li.description: Our gardens has sprouted new blooms, but there is plenty of room for more flowers.

li.label: many flowers planted
li.description: Our gardens flourish! The breeze is sweet with the colors and scents of this year's flower beds.

li.label: plethora of flowers planted
li.description: Such a delightful riot of colors and shapes. Valerian must be smiling upon us for taking good care of this land!

li.label: no flower gardens
li.description: We don't have a flower garden to admire and relax in, not even a shrubbery. Our community feels so drab and colorless.

li.label: inadequate flower gardens
li.description: What is this, a garden for Pudgemice? It needs to be at least three times as big!

li.label: Horrified by heretic execution

li.label: Horrified by heretic execution
li.description: Everyone knew this was all wrong! I don't feel safe here anymore...

li.description: None of the charges made any sense, and yet the prisoners were condemned to the fires. Is this what Valerian would have wanted?

li.label: Terrible heretic execution

li.description: Justice had to be served against those heretics. May Valerian the Wise be merciful and grant them a place in The Great Garden.

li.description: Such barbarism! I don't feel safe here anymore...

li.label: Spectacular heretic execution
li.description: To think such depraved individuals once lived among us... we were right to purge the impure from this community!

li.label: Spectacular heretic execution
li.description: The flames, the screams! Valerian be praised, for thy will has been done!
